summary.description:
Inferring Chromosome Radial Organization from Hi-C Data.

The included Python scripts (mat2net.py, and predictCTpos.py) contain an implemention of the HIRAC computational technique described in the following manuscript.

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'CTs', 'territories', 'radial', 'compartmentalization'
summary.name: HIRAC
